description:
Guide to Keyword Research

In this insightful course by BrandBlast - We're going to be covering how to find and use effective keywords for your business.

What we'll achieve by the end is giving our students a fully equiped knowledge base for performing highly effective keyword research, where to use them and how to do it again.

Keywords plan an unspoken role in your content and it's time we brought that to light. Learn How To Find & Use Effective Keywords in this Guide to Keyword Research.

Discussed Points:

  • What are Keywords & Why are They Important?
  • How to Identify Effective Keywords via Keyword / Market Research
  • Tools & Resources Available for Keyword Research
  • Where to Use These Keywords
  • How to Duplicate
title: Guide to Keyword Research
